required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of Tolvaptan in Patients With Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease (ADPKD) [Extension of Trial 156-04-251 in Japan]
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-label Extension Study to Investigate the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of Tolvaptan in Patients With Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease (ADPKD) [Extension of Trial 156-04-251 in Japan]

brief_summary.textblock: ADPKD patients who enrolled in Trial 156-04-251 will receive repeated oral administration of tolvaptan twice daily (morning and evening: 45mg/15mg, 60mg/30mg, or 90mg/30mg).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every month until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient

primary_outcome.measure: Vital signs (systolic and diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every month until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient
Every month until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient

primary_outcome.measure: Laboratory values (hematology, serum chemistry and urinalysis)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every 3 months until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient
Every 12 months until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient

primary_outcome.measure: 12-lead ECG (heart rate, PR interval, QRS interval and QT interval)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every 12 months until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient

primary_outcome.measure: Combined renal volume (right and left kidneys)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every 12 months until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient

primary_outcome.measure: Renal function (estimated GFR and serum cystatin C)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every 3 months until 4 years from the date of initial trial drug administration to the first patient

clinical_study.condition: Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease ï¼ˆADPKD)

arm_group.description: Repeated oral administration twice daily (morning and evening) at one of three split dose-regimens 45mg/15mg, 60mg/30mg or 90mg/30mg.

intervention.description: Repeated oral administration twice daily (morning and evening) at one of three split dose-regimens 45mg/15mg, 60mg/30mg or 90mg/30mg.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who participated in Trial 156-04-251 in Japan and for whom CRF collection has been completed.
- Patients who completed 3-year repeated administration and who completed the second follow-up visit or patients whose treatment with the trial drug was interupted due to pregnancy and who completed out the second follow-up visit in Trial 156-04-251.
- Patients in whom any adverse events occurring in Trial 156-04-251 were resolved orstabilized and require no further follow-up.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with eGFR of less than 15 mL/min/1.73 m2
- Pregnant, breast-feeding, or possibly pregnant women or women who are planning to become pregnant
- Patients who received any investigational drug other than Tolvaptan within 30 days prior to commencement of administration of tolvaptan
- Any patients who, in the opinion of the principle investigator or subinvestigators, should not participate in the study
